sentences.english: Soon he got back his composure and walked sulkily home.
sentences.chinese: 不久，他回过神来并且悻悻然地走回家。

sentences.english: After the bitterly fell asleep and did not care.
sentences.chinese: 之后就悻悻睡着，并没有在意。

sentences.english: Doberman aware of the shortage, but angry hunters return to the side.
sentences.chinese: 猎狗知道实在追不上了，只好悻悻地回到猎人身边。

sentences.english: 'Well, I suppose we'll have to change our plans, 'said Sir Walter unhappily.
sentences.chinese: “我想我们必须改变计划，”瓦尔特爵士悻悻地说。

sentences.english: Oscar got up and tramped out of the kitchen .
sentences.chinese: 奥斯卡站起身悻悻地走出厨房。

sentences.english: Finish saying, take a few beneath charge Xing Xing grounds to leave.
sentences.chinese: 说完，带着几个手下悻悻地离去。

sentences.english: The helpless prince then came back to his country resentfully.
sentences.chinese: 无可奈何的王子，就这样悻悻地回到了自己的国家。

sentences.english: And he moved moodily away and began to dress himself.
sentences.chinese: 悻悻地走开，并且开始穿衣服。

definition: variant of 憤憤|愤愤[fen4 fen4]
dull gray/gloomy/dejected/crestfallen/with one's tail between one's legs
variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
